title: Bugsplat after Champ select
body: I'm having an issue with bugsplatting after champion select. I've tried deleting the config files and repairing the client. If you could please help me solve this that would be great.  Thank you

replies.body:
I found this SOLUTION.

Open the Xbox app by going to the Search bar on the bottom left of the screen and typing "Xbox"
Click on the Settings (Gear) icon on the left.
Click on Game DVR at the top.
Click on the On/Off (switch) under "Record game clips and screenshots using Game DVR" to turn it off. (it should be gray and set to "Off")

This could be caused by a couple of different things. There certainly have been some recent Windows updates that have been causing similar types of problems, but by far, most issues with bugsplats are the result of bad drivers or hardware issues. As a quick first step, I recommend working through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), which covers the most common solutions.

Let me know if that guide resolved the issue.

Yesterday windows forced me to do a update and ever since my league has been playing up big time. I got in a game and it was fine for a bit but then out of no where it was as if everything was deforming and melting (something I never had a problem with before this windows update) I've been at it for 6 hours now and still haven't found a solution. Idk if the update has destroyed my graphics card or not because I have a laptop that has 2 different gpu's (one amd and the other the regular Intel one) and when I use the amd one this is when I'm having the problems but when I use the Intel one  everything is fine but on my amd one I can run the game at very high 60fps constant but on my Intel one only about 40fps on very low. Help please! :)
